result.eng: The hall was named after Saint Patrick.
result.ga: Ainmníodh an halla i ndiaidh Naomh Pádraig
result.orig: Ainmníodh an halla i ndiaidh Naomh Pádraig
result.html: Ainmníodh an halla i ndiaidh Naomh PádraigThe hall was named after Saint Patrick.
result.ponchtml: Ainmníoḋ an halla i ndiaiḋ Naoṁ PádraigThe hall was named after Saint Patrick.

result.eng: I like the hall and the sitting room.
result.ga: Is maith liom an halla agus an seomra suite
result.orig: Is maith liom an halla agus an seomra suite
result.html: Is maith liom an halla agus an seomra suiteI like the hall and the sitting room.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom an halla agus an seomra suiteI like the hall and the sitting room.
